name: Simple Increment
description:
Simple Increment is a simple idle clicker game with easy goals but various possibilities.

Click to get money or buy generators to produce passive income. Buy various upgrades to get even more profit. Use prestige system to get powerful boosts. Collect achievements and conquer the leaderboard. Just have fun!

  • Simple but addictive idle clicker gameplay with possibility to complete the game
  • Various upgrades and prestige system
  • Cute minimalistic graphics and calm ambient music
  • Detailed stats to track your progress
  • Achievements and global leaderboard
  • Light and dark themes included

If you are looking for some game to relax than Simple Increment is your choice.
